content: Hey, are there any plans to update the Archer interface using a more modern design? Is that possibly what the QT is for?
Mahdi, that is exactly what the qt tasks are for
@Mahdi in fact, the plans are to go far beyond what archer does, but that's the obvious starting point.
so if you want to help us do that, please tackle those tasks :)
@Naseef the appleseed tasks are very much coding tasks -- it's only the first that's not to make sure you get set up
